ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 120- (BC) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 120 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the overland flooding from the Nechako River that affected the City of Prince George between December 10, 2007 and January 29, 2008.
